text: Uye ku (vanhu veku) Madyan, takava tinotumira mukoma wavo Shuaib. Akati kwavari: “Imi vanhu vangu! Namatai Allah! Hamuna mumwe mwari kunze kwavo (Allah). Zvirokwazvo, humboo huri pachena hwave hunouya kwamuri kubva kuna Tenzi venyu. Naizvozvo ipai chiero chakakwana uye neuremu hwakakwana, uye musave munokanganisira vanhu muzvinhu zvavo, uye musave munokonzeresa zvakaipa munyika mushure mekunge yagadziriswa, izvi zvinova zvakanaka kwamuri kana muri vatendi.”
